mapper.sql: a_d_id, u_id, c_d_id, a_d_price, a_d_explain, a_d_time, a_id
mapper.select:
SELECT ad.u_id,ad.a_id,ad.a_d_price,u.u_name uName,ad.a_d_time,ad.a_d_explain, cd.c_d_name cdName,a.a_even aEven,a.a_state aState
FROM account_dispatch ad
INNER JOIN (SELECT * from category_dispatch) cd ON cd.c_d_id = ad.c_d_id INNER JOIN
(SELECT * from apply WHERE a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) a ON a.a_id = ad.a_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `user`) u ON u.u_id=ad.u_id

SELECT ad.u_id,ad.a_id,ad.a_d_price,u.u_name uName,ad.a_d_time, ad.a_d_explain,cd.c_d_name cdName,a.a_even aEven,a.a_state aState FROM account_dispatch ad
INNER JOIN (SELECT * from category_dispatch) cd ON cd.c_d_id = ad.c_d_id INNER JOIN
(SELECT * from apply) a ON a.a_id = ad.a_id INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE `user`.u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) u ON u.u_id=ad.u_id
mapper.insert: insert into account_dispatch (a_d_id, u_id, c_d_id, a_d_price, a_d_explain, a_d_time, a_id) values (#{aDId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cDId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aDPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{aDExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aDTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into account_dispatch
a_d_id,
u_id,
c_d_id,
a_d_price,
a_d_explain,
a_d_time,
a_id,

mapper.update:
update account_dispatch
u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_d_id = #{cDId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
a_d_price = #{aDPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
a_d_explain = #{aDExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_d_time = #{aDTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where a_d_id = #{aDId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update account_dispatch set u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_d_id = #{cDId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_d_price = #{aDPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, a_d_explain = #{aDExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_d_time = #{aDTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where a_d_id = #{aDId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
